column4: I've installed amarok on an ubuntu server installation and the tray icon is showing up as a question mark, as if it couldn't find the icon... any clues how to fix it?
why are you installing amarok on the server release? Why didnt you install the desktop if you wanted a desktop system?

It's not a desktop system, it's forwarding X to another machine for a set number of applications.  However, if installing the "ubuntu-desktop" package would be the solution to amarok then that would mean amarok is missing a dependency somewhere along the way.  using the server release isn't "the problem".
